author: nhcwebmaster@noaa.gov (NHC Webmaster)
nhc_headline: ...CATEGORY 5 ERIN CONTINUING TO PASS NORTH OF THE NORTHERN LEEWARD ISLANDS... ...NEW TROPICAL STORM WATCH FOR THE TURKS AND CAICOS ISLANDS...
summary: ...CATEGORY 5 ERIN CONTINUING TO PASS NORTH OF THE NORTHERN LEEWARD ISLANDS... ...NEW TROPICAL STORM WATCH FOR THE TURKS AND CAICOS ISLANDS... As of 5:00 PM AST Sat Aug 16 the center of Erin was located near 20.0, -64.0 with movement W at 15 mph. The minimum central pressure was 915 mb with maximum sustained winds of about 160 mph.

title: Summary - Hurricane Erin (AT5/AL052025)
